column2: With our influence over the independent states in northern italy we can 'convince' them to join Sardinia-Piedmont if that suits our aims in the region.
In this year the house of Romanov shall celebrate the 300th anniversary of its succession to the russian throne as Stalin travels to Vienna to further his studies.
This CB fixes the warscore value in order to keep warscore values consistent and prevent exploits. These values are halved during Great Wars.
